department: W3380-23FD03 Plancher de tuiles en caoutchouc
description: Rubber floor covering including delivery and installation.
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement for Rubber Tile Flooring
## W3380-23FD03

### Mandatory Information

* **Tender Reference Number**: W3380-23FD03
* **Publication Date**: November 2, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: November 21, 2023 at 2:00 pm (Eastern Standard Time)
* **Procurement Category**: Goods / Supplies

### Description of Goods / Supplies

* **UNSPSC Code**: 56121303
* **Description**: Rubber Brush Floor Matting
* **Site Location**: Saint-Jean-sur-Richelieu, Québec, Canada

### Notification Information

* **Contact Information**: 
  * Name: Annie Blanchet (SPAC/PSPC)
  * Email: annie.blanchet@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
  * Department: Department of Public Works and Government Services

### Requirements

* **Request for Proposal (RFP)**: PWGSC, on behalf of the National Defence of Canada, is seeking qualified suppliers for the acquisition, delivery, and installation of rubber floor covering as detailed in [Annex A](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17901660?extsite=MTc5MDE2NjBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).
* **Free Trade Agreements**: Please note that the tender process will be conducted in accordance with the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), and Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement.

### Tenders

* **Submission Method**: Tenders must be submitted online through the given URL, referencing the tender reference number.
* **Closing Date and Time**: November 21, 2023 at 2:00 pm (Eastern Standard Time). Please note that the tender status is expired.
